questions.question: She went to the library ___ some reference books.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: He opened the window ___ fresh air in.
questions.explanation: 目的「〜するために」を表します。

questions.question: They visited the museum ___ the new exhibition.
questions.explanation: 目的を説明する to 不定詞。

questions.question: We went to the supermarket ___ some fruits.
questions.explanation: 目的「買うため」です。

questions.question: She stayed up late ___ her homework finished.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: He called his friend ___ the schedule.
questions.explanation: 目的「確認するため」です。

questions.question: They left early ___ the first train.
questions.explanation: 目的を示す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: I visited the teacher ___ some advice.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: She went downtown ___ a gift for her sister.
questions.explanation: 目的「見つけるため」です。

questions.question: He went to the gym ___ stronger.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: We gathered in the hall ___ the announcement.

questions.explanation: 目的を示す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: He put on his glasses ___ the board clearly.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: She visited the park ___ pictures of the flowers.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: He went outside ___ with his friends.
questions.explanation: 目的「遊ぶため」です。

questions.question: They sat in front ___ the fireworks show.
questions.explanation: 目的を表す to 不定詞です。

questions.question: I opened the book ___ the answer.

questions.question: She hurried home ___ dinner for her family.
questions.explanation: 目的を表します。

questions.question: The teacher told us ___ quietly.
questions.explanation: tell + 人 + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: My parents advised me ___ a coat.
questions.explanation: advise + 人 + to 動詞。

questions.question: She asked him ___ the door.
questions.explanation: ask + 人 + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: He told his sister ___ careful.

questions.explanation: remind + 人 + to 動詞。

questions.question: This box is too heavy ___ alone.
questions.explanation: too 〜 to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: He was too tired ___ homework.
questions.explanation: too + 形容詞 + to 動詞。

questions.question: The question was too difficult ___ quickly.
questions.explanation: too difficult to 動詞。

questions.question: She is too shy ___ in front of the class.
questions.explanation: too 形容詞 to 動詞。

questions.question: It was too dark ___ any pictures.
questions.explanation: too 形容詞 to 動詞。

questions.question: The road was too narrow ___ two cars.
questions.explanation: too 形容詞 to 動詞。

questions.question: He is too young ___ a part-time job.
questions.explanation: too 形容詞 to 動詞。

questions.question: The bag was too full ___ closed.

questions.question: She felt too sleepy ___ the movie.

questions.question: The sound was too loud ___ in the room.
questions.explanation: too 形容詞 to 動詞。

questions.question: He is strong enough ___ the heavy door.
questions.explanation: 形容詞 + enough + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: She is old enough ___ on her own.
questions.explanation: ～するのに十分な... の表現です。

questions.question: The water is warm enough ___.
questions.explanation: enough の後は to 動詞です。

questions.question: He studied hard enough ___ the exam.
questions.explanation: enough を伴う to 不定詞。

questions.question: The room is big enough ___ twenty people.
questions.explanation: 十分な大きさを表す to 動詞です。

questions.question: We arrived early enough ___ good seats.
questions.explanation: enough の後は to 動詞です。

questions.question: The soup is cool enough ___ now.

questions.question: She is confident enough ___ the speech.
questions.explanation: enough + to 動詞 を使います。

questions.question: The ladder is long enough ___ the roof.
questions.explanation: 十分な長さを示す to 動詞です。

questions.question: He saved enough money ___ a new bike.
questions.explanation: enough + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: I don't know how ___ this machine.
questions.explanation: 疑問詞 + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: Please tell me what ___ next.

questions.explanation: 形容詞 + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.question: We were lucky ___ tickets for the show.
questions.explanation: 形容詞 + to 動詞 の形です。

questions.explanation: It takes/took ... to 動詞。
